locations: St. Thomas, United States Virgin Islands
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein signed his will on August 8, 2019, just two days before his suicide on August 10, 2019.
Epstein's estate was valued at $577,672,654 and was placed into a trust called The 1953 Trust.
The executors of his estate are longtime employees Darren Indyke (lawyer) and Richard Kahn (businessman), with Boris Nikolic as an alternate.
Epstein's only potential heir was his brother, Mark Epstein, but the will supersedes any claim he might have had.
The will was filed in the US Virgin Islands, where Epstein was a resident, potentially for privacy reasons.
